name: Square Saga
description:
Tap to jump from side to side on lines and collect blue squares without hitting the red squares. Sound easy? Well give it a try. A nice and simple game.

Features:
◈ Online Leaderboards!
◈ Screenshot Sharing
◈ Smooth and Fast Gameplay
◈ Challenges and Achievements!

We'd love to hear your Ideas and Reviews! We read all of them! We have a lot of great ideas planned for the future!
Thank you for downloading this game!!!
